title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 298.15 - Forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 298.15 - Forms

State Regulations
(FMR 102-37.205) Documents in use by the SASP to evidence
the distribution of property to eligible donees are: (a) Eligibility Application Form
#CS401
(b) Participation Agreement
and Designation of Authorized

Representatives Form Form #CS402
(c) Donee Pickup Notice Form #CS404
(d) Vessel Conditional Transfer Document Form
#CS407
(e) Combat Aircraft

Conditional Transfer Document Form #CS408
(f) Non-Combat Aircraft Conditional Transfer

Document Form #CS409
(g) Nondiscrimination Assurance Form Form #CS410
(h) Invoice Document Form #CS413
(i) Utilization/Cannibalization Survey Form

Form #CS423

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
298.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
